answers.answer: Omg I'm 30 weeks prego and was told I might have it too...my doc sent me to the lab to check my glucose levels ....I feel super depress too ...I was told, u will only have diabetes during pregnancy and once baby born, no worries it will be gone ....I'm not sure tho....stay positive an drink lots of water ...

OK thanks yea my doctor sent me too when I got there n they draw my blood it was too high but when I had went to my doctor Appt to see my doctor they draw my blood n it came back positive. Iam try not worrie so much n stay focus.
How high are your numbers .. im on insulin which helps control my numbers everything will be okay

I had diabetes with my last baby.  It really helped to change my diet and walk around more.   I got lucky and didn't have to take insulin.   But I do need to take shots for a blood thinner.  You get used to it pretty quickly.  Lots of people have diabetes when they have a baby and the baby turns out just fine.
They be 156 275 274 they put me on some pills I have to take twice a day if that don't work they going put me on insulin

Ok I wanted to do the pills but im too far in my preganacy 36 weeks and my doc Said it takes two weeks for it get in your system fully... everything will b fine just take one day at a time and leave it in gods hands ill b praying for you and your little munchkin. ..

question: Do anyone else have diabetes I found out I do. I feel so emotional I wish I had found sooner my blood sugar always high I feel so bad. And iam 25 weeks pregnant. I just pray everything OK with my baby.
title: feeling  sad
